name: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike
description: Vanilla Bagel: The Roguelike is a mostly classic RPG/Roguelike with a vast game world. The game has dozens of dungeons and items, and hundreds of unique enemies. There is a great variety in magic, curses and item enchantments.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 150 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Cool, I love how you can explore the world and learn about it. Also, dying feels like my own fault and doesnt suck.
